name: Flower Auctions International (Vereniging van Bloemenveilingen)
membership:
Member of Copa-Cogeca, Member of NCR
Member of VNO-NCW in the Netherlands, member of Business Europe
goal: Serving the interests of the members of FAI, which are the cooperatives Royal FloraHolland and Plantion and as such serving the interests of the members of Royal FloraHolland and Plantion which are Dutch and worldwide based ornamental producers. Supporting the marketing of ornamental products.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
*Invasive Alien Species EC1143/2014
*Review VAT Directive EC 2006/112EG
*Plant Health Regulation EU 2016/2031 and Official Controls Regulation EU 2017/625
* Report on the Directive on the legal protection of biotechnological inventions Directive 98/44 EC
* REGULATION on information provision and promotion measures for agricultural products on the internal market and in third countries COM 2013/0398
* GMO Directive 2001/18/EC with respect to new breeding techniques
